data.eml:eml: Revision of Mesitiinae (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae) from Madagascar, with description of eleven new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barbosa, Diego N., Azevedo, Celso O. (2012): Revision of Mesitiinae (Hymenoptera, Bethylidae) from Madagascar, with description of eleven new species. Zootaxa 3417: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.246276
